content: this is an easy pattern for a comfy hat one skein of 107 yards is perfect and will leave enough yarn for an optional pom pom i have made this pattern with beginners in mind to keep it simple and fun i used my circular needles for the entire project also i know as a beginner you have limited tools and there is no need to invest in another set of needles for the project however feel free to use dpn s for the decreasing row they would also work great for the hat i hope you enjoy making this hat i would love to see the hats you made from the pattern please feel free to tag me on your instagram posts or follow me for a little bit of inspiration @mor_oddz_n_endz
